page.title: 03Beef Cattle
page.content: In the area which we have covered there are a number of Beef Cattle farms. The bulls which do not produce milk are fattened up and then sent to market to be sold as meat,then they are taken to an abattoir to be slaughtered.Next the meat is taken to a meat market and sold to a family butcher or a meat wholesaler. The bull hide is also sold to make leather which is rather expensive to buy. The bulls are taken out to the grassy pastures early in the morning and then brought back to special cattle sheds at dusk. This is the main job of the beef farmer.
